title: Painkiller.Hell & Damnation.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Painkiller.Hell & Damnation.Repack-R.G.Mechanics


Released: October 31, 2012
Genres: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person
Publication Type: Repack
Game Language: Eng | Rus
Voice Language:Eng | Rus
Crack: enclosing (ALI213)


System requirements:  
=================

Operating System: Microsoft Windows XP (SP3) / Vista / 7
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2 GHz / equivalent AMD Athlon 64 X2
Memory: 2 GB
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT (256 MB VRAM)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0c
Free space on hard disk: 6.2 GB

Game information:  
=================


Playing with a terrible name Painkiller: Hell & Damnation, which in Russian means
"Hell and the Curse" - a remake of the original Painkiller, appeared on the market in 2004.

Let's start with the fact that the level of graphics is not dropped - thanks to the
Unreal Engine 3 locations still look great. Levels have not undergone almost no changes
(except that location enriched hitherto unseen secret areas). But a new story.
Magical action takes place after the events of the first part. In addition,
a significantly improved physics.

The authors of The Farm 51 will delight gamers still fresh and network modes,
online tournaments and other online goodies.

=================
